value.title: Sorting months in fiscal calendars in DAX
value.excerpt: This video shows a basic technique used to sort months according to a fiscal calendar, by using a couple of calculated columns and the “sort by column” feature of Power BI. Article and download: https://sql.bi/492713?aff=yt

value.title: Using GENERATE and ROW instead of ADDCOLUMNS in DAX
value.excerpt: Improve DAX queries by using GENERATE and ROW instead of ADDCOLUMNS when you create table expressions. value.title: Working below a DAX formula’s granularity
value.excerpt: How to control the result of a DAX measure used in a report with granularity below the granularity supported by the formula. value.title: Implement advanced data visualization techniques by using Power BI
value.excerpt: Implement advanced data visualization techniques by using Power BI

topItems.title: Understand advanced data visualization concepts
topItems.excerpt: Create cohesive, inclusive, and efficient Power BI reports to effectively communicate results.

topItems.title: Monitor data in real-time with Power BI
topItems.excerpt: Describe real-time analytics in Power BI using automatic page refresh, real-time dashboards, and auto-refresh in paginated reports.

topItems.title: Create paginated reports
topItems.excerpt: Paginated reports allow report developers to create Power BI artifacts that have tightly controlled rendering requirements. Paginated reports are ideal for creating sales invoices, receipts, purchase orders, and tabular data. This module will teach you how to create reports, add parameters, and work with tables and charts in paginated reports.

value.title: Introduction to data analytics on Azure
value.excerpt: Introduction to data analytics on Azure

topItems.title: Explore Azure data services for modern analytics
topItems.excerpt: Understand analytics solutions in the Azure data ecosystem. Explore the architecture of a scalable analytics solution to meet business needs.

topItems.title: Understand concepts of data analytics
topItems.excerpt: Explore key concepts of data analytics, including types of analytics, data, and storage. Explore the analytics process and tools used to discover insights.

topItems.title: Explore data analytics at scale
topItems.excerpt: Describe data analytics at scale and understand the roles of a data team. Learn about the responsibilities of an enterprise data analyst and what tools are available to build scalable solutions.

value.title: Analyze data with Power BI
value.excerpt: This module goes beyond viewing and exploring your content and explains how to interact with it by working with reports and dashboards to uncover and share new business insights.

value.title: Automate data cleaning with Power Query
value.excerpt: This module introduces Power Query in Microsoft Excel, a powerful data connection, cleaning, and shaping technology that is a core part of the Microsoft modern analytics suite of business intelligence tools.

value.title: Becoming a solution architect for Dynamics 365 and Power Platform
value.excerpt: Learn how to become a solution architect.

value.title: Build systems of insights for enterprise scale with Power BI and Azure
value.excerpt: Build systems of insights for enterprise scale with Power BI and Azure

value.title: Create and manage Power BI assets
value.excerpt: Creating shared data assets for your analytics environment provides structure and consistency. Maintaining those assets is as important, and XMLA endpoint provides additional administrative capabilities.

value.title: Add measures to Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: In this module, you'll learn how to work with implicit and explicit measures. You'll start by creating simple measures, which summarize a single column or table. Then, you'll create more complex measures based on other measures in the model. Additionally, you'll learn about the similarities of, and differences between, a calculated column and a measure.

value.title: Add DAX calculation groups to Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: Learn how you can add many similar measures to your model.

value.title: Modify DAX filter context in Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: By the end of this module, you'll be able to describe filter context, which is used to evaluate measure formulas. You'll then learn why some calculations need to modify filter context and that it can be achieved by using the CALCULATE function. Additionally, you'll learn how to configure the CALCULATE function with filters and filter modifiers.

value.title: Use DAX in Power BI Desktop to solve business problems
value.excerpt: In this module, you’ll solve three different business problems by optimizing the data model and creating Data Analysis Expressions (DAX) calculations.

value.title: Discover customer needs as a Solution Architect for Dynamics 365 and Power Platform
value.excerpt: Learn how to ask customers questions about their business processes and feature requirements to create a viable solution.

value.title: Explore Azure data services for modern analytics
value.excerpt: Understand analytics solutions in the Azure data ecosystem. Explore the architecture of a scalable analytics solution to meet business needs.

value.title: Explore data analytics at scale
value.excerpt: Describe data analytics at scale and understand the roles of a data team. Learn about the responsibilities of an enterprise data analyst and what tools are available to build scalable solutions.

value.title: Power Platform - Introduction, business value, and demos
value.excerpt: Explore the capabilities of Power Platform applications, as seen in demonstrations and customer case studies.

value.title: Manage datasets in Power BI
value.excerpt: With Microsoft Power BI, you can build multiple reports from a single dataset, meaning that if you change the dataset, all reports will be updated with that change. Additionally, you can clean and prep data once rather than repeatedly for each report.

value.title: Introduction to foundations in data modeling
value.excerpt: This module introduces the key concepts that are related to developing a well-organized data model.

value.title: Design interactive data experiences with Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: Power BI enables report authors to produce interactive reports using visuals, slicers, bookmarks, and more.

value.title: Integrate Power BI in Microsoft Teams and SharePoint
value.excerpt: This module goes into the different ways users can incorporate Power BI reports or visuals into Microsoft Teams and SharePoint to collaborate with others. This functionality allows users to pair analytics with collaboration tools they are already familiar with.

value.title: Monitor data in real-time with Power BI
value.excerpt: Describe real-time analytics in Power BI using automatic page refresh, real-time dashboards, and auto-refresh in paginated reports.

value.title: Facilitate collaboration and sharing in Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to collaborate and share dashboards and reports with coworkers.

value.title: Establish a data access infrastructure in Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to establish a data access infrastructure for accessing all your data within Power BI.

value.title: Monitor and audit usage
value.excerpt: Learn how to use activity logs and auditing with Power BI to monitor and inspect user activity in a Power BI environment.

value.title: Provision Premium capacity in Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn about the differences between Power BI Pro and Power BI Premium, and how Power BI Premium manages capacity resources.

value.title: Design Power BI reports
value.excerpt: Because Power BI includes more than 30 core visuals, it can be challenging for a beginner to select the correct visual. This module will guide you through selecting the most appropriate visual type to meet your design and report layout requirements.

value.title: Propose a solution as a Solution Architect for Power Platform and Dynamics 365
value.excerpt: Learn how to propose a solution.
